channel.title: Talks on Michael Abadi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Michael Abadi's Blog

item.title: Discover Swift Package Manager
item.description: Swift ID Dev is an Indonesian study group community that is being organized by Nico. In this session, I mentored iOS developers about how to create a simple package manager for personal project as well basic foundation of a modularization. Slides: https://github.com/abadikaka/conference-and-talks/blob/main/SPM.key

item.title: iOS Dev Thailand Conference 2020
item.description: Session 1 : Unboxing the debugger: Broke the myth of debugging in iOS in an easy way by Michael Abadi, Agoda. In this conference, I was presenting a session about debugging in iOS followed by a presentation from Federico Zanetello about Swift Package Manager

item.title: iOS Indonesia Conference 2020
item.description: In this conference, I was presenting a session about debugging in iOS followed by a presentation from Edward Anthony about Network Abstraction Layer and Bondan Eko Prasetyo about Modularization at Scale.
